metadata.title: CVE-2023-1183 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Libreoffice package. An attacker can craft an odbcontaining a "database/script" file with a SCRIPT command where thecontents of the file could be written to a new file whose location wasdetermined by the attacker.

criterions.comment: hsqldb1.8.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
